vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
νυμφ-ών, ῶνος, ὁ,
bridechamber, [LXX+NT+1st c.AD+]
__II temple of Dionysus, Demeter, and Persephone, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__III a kind of νυμφαία, Ps.-[Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: a bridal-chamber;, in NT υἱοὶ τοῦ νυμφῶνος, sons of the bridal-chamber, the bridegroom's attendant friends, groomsmen, Mt. 9:15; Mk. 2:19; Lk. 5:34*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: salón de bodas ; asistente del novio, invitado a la boda
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
新娘房
在新郎身旁,在婚禮中擔任要角的人 (太 9:15; 可 2:19; 路 5:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
新娘房
在新郎身旁,在婚礼中担任要角的人 (太 9:15; 可 2:19; 路 5:34)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: phòng hôn lễ; buồng cưới; chàng rể
